steps.text:
CASE RECORDS of the MASSACHUSETTS GENERAL HOSPITAL. Case 8-2016. A 71-Year-Old 
Man with Recurrent Fevers, Hypoxemia, and Lung Infiltrates.
Saukkonen K(1), Sharma A(1), Mark EJ(1).

Author information:
(1)From the Departments of Pulmonary and Critical Care (K.S.), Radiology (A.S.), 
and Pathology (E.J.M.), Massachusetts General Hospital, and the Departments of 
Pulmonary and Critical Care (K.S.), Radiology (A.S.), and Pathology (E.J.M.), 
Harvard Medical School - both in Boston.
